MASProceduralService.Name: AccountCreation
MASProceduralService.Description: The AccountCreation service provides methods for clients to create and update accounts and their account views in the MetraNet database. These methods are only used to write information to the database.

ProceduralMethod.Name: AddAccount
ProceduralMethod.Description: The AddAccount method allows clients to add new accounts to the MetraNet system.

Parameter.Name: Account
Parameter.Description: The AddAccount method accepts as a parameter an instance of a class derived from the abstract Account base class that has been populated with the new account’s information. It takes that Account-based object and writes the contained information to the MetraNet database.

Parameter.Name: ApplyAccountTemplate
Parameter.Description: If the applyTemplate parameter is set to true, the service will attempt to locate a template for the account’s type in the account hierarchy.

ProceduralMethod.Name: UpdateAccount
ProceduralMethod.Description: The UpdateAccount method allows clients to modify accounts in the MetraNet system.

Parameter.Name: Account
Parameter.Description: The UpdateAccount method accepts as a parameter an instance of a class derived from the abstract Account base class that has been populated with the modified account information. It takes that Account-based object and writes the contained information to the MetraNet database.

Parameter.Name: ApplyAccountTemplate
Parameter.Description: If the applyTemplate parameter is set to true, the service will attempt to locate a template for the account’s type in the account hierarchy.

Parameter.Name: LoadTime
Parameter.Description: The time that this account should be loaded. It should be between the start date and end date for the account (this is particularly important for accounts created in future time). If set to null, the current MetraTime will be used as the load time.

ProceduralMethod.Name: UpdateAccountView
ProceduralMethod.Description: The UpdateAccountView method allows clients to modify account views in the MetraNet system.

Parameter.Name: Account
Parameter.Description: The UpdateAccountView method accepts as a parameter an identifier for an account.
